title: Statue of Bartolomeo Colleoni, Venice
medium: Brush and watercolor, pen and black ink, graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric
description: Vertical sheet depicting statue of a man seated on horseback raised on a plinth mounted on a thick cornice.  The cornice is supported by Corinthian columns set on high bases.  This is all raised up on a three-part stepped rectangular base.  All elements of this monument have a greenish-gray color, as if to indicate they are made of a gray metal, or a patinated copper.  The sheet has pin holes in all four corners.
name: Album page
